sentence: This is at around 130 in the am Needless to say we started bringing our own cocktails to the pool
Any food served at the bar was predominantly served raw
We stayed in room 401 which is directly under the executive lounge

People who stayed near the marathon start finish fared much better I was fooled by Hilton being listed on the marathon home page as a sponsor so I thought that meant they would be helpful instead of terribly inconvenient not just for sleep but in the tremendous challenge of getting to and from the marathon in face we abandoned getting back to the hotel after the marathon and just went to the airport to fly on with no showers or clean clothing
It has a secluded feel and the water is by far the most clear and serene I have ever been in
I do know why but as I said before it was very few people at the hotel
It also cost 60 round trip to the airport
We were given a 25 food drink credit and items on the menu were more than covered by this
We had to ask for wash clothes as none were in the room
There are mosquitos in Curacao and bringing bug spray is advised
I especially love the crew that works the lobby bar
This is our third visit but since our last visit it has been renovated recently and is lovely clean and attractive
The location pools beaches and snorkeling are excellent
C Spice had very nice menu in th vining as well as pizza
Junior who was was pleasant and accommodating
The staff at C Spice Chef Sherneth The omelet queen Paulete Mark the BP director Servers Christopher Shakira Nlula Kiona Kevin Saun Yousi Karen Crestina Nathan Eldrige Nikita Venesa the supervisor
We were in town for my mothers medical emergency
Nice sand and no vendors on the beach
The Cons• European style electrical outlets
We will return when this pandemic goes away for we did not enjoy all that the hotel and island has to offer
